title: Eden par mawi chul hnu ti vul leh turin
lyrics:
Eden par mawi chul hnu ti vul leh turin,
Khawvel Chhandamtua lo piang ta;
Pialral nun mawi min rawn sintir leh theih nan,
Lal Chungnung berin hmu tlawm ber a rawn thlang.

I lawm ang u, Remna lal lo piang hi,
A fakna lei leh van thang chhuak se;
Hei ang renga kan tan a lal lawmawm hi,
An piang lo, an piang leh tawh lawng chatuanin.

Hmana miten hmuh an chak ni lawmawm hi,
Hmu lovin sang tam tak an liam ta;
lal lungawi kum hun lawmawm Chhandamna hi,
Keini zawng kan chan bik hi kan vannei hle.

Tun hma, tun hnu, van hnuai mi hmingsak zingah,
Chhandamtu dang reng an piang tawh lawng;
Hmana mi thianghlim. Sumeona ang khan,
Hmua lawm apiang mi vannei ber an ni.

Lei leh van a chhiar sen loh mipui zingah,
A tha chunnung ber e, Chhandamtu;
Israel-ten an hnawl a, an paih hnu kha,
Van lal reng ro pialral lunghlu ka chhar ta.
